biography: Hélène Vincent, born 9 September 1940, is a French actress.  She received a César Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role in 1989 for her role as Madame Marielle Le Quesnoy in Life Is a Long Quiet River and another in 1992 for J'embrasse pas. name: Hélène Vincent
